ComicInfo.Summary:
Hunter reveals a lethal secret that could spell doom for Door, but the Marquis De Carabas may have one final stratagem left to play.
Old Bailey purchases the mutilated corpse of the Marquis from the sewer folk at the floating market and raises him from the dead with an egg in a box that de Carabas had given him for safe keeping. Hunter betrays Door to the Messrs in exchange for a spear that can kill the Great Beast of London, which arrives soon after the resurrected Marquis saves Richard from becoming Hunter's prey.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/neil-gaimans-neverwhere-8-chapter-eight/4000-108835/

ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Eight
